detail_desc: Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with a racer back.
Sleeveless top in a crinkled viscose weave in a narrow cut with gathers at the top. Short, narrow shoulder straps, and opening and button at the back of the neck and a lace trimmed hem.
Sleeveless top in a crinkled viscose weave in a narrow cut with gathers at the top. Short, narrow shoulder straps, and opening and button at the back of the neck and a lace trimmed hem.
Sleeveless top in a crinkled viscose weave in a narrow cut with gathers at the top. Short, narrow shoulder straps, and opening and button at the back of the neck and a lace trimmed hem.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in soft viscose jersey with a seam at the waist with a crossover detail. Unlined.
Lace balconette bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that lift and shape. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in woven fabric with lace down the front, elastication and a drawstring at the top and short sleeves.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in woven fabric with lace down the front, elastication and a drawstring at the top and short sleeves.

Shirt in a cotton and cupro weave with a turn-down collar and classic front in a straight style with a gently tapered waist. Open chest pocket, a yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. The cupro content of the shirt is recycled.

Shirt in a cotton and cupro weave with a turn-down collar and classic front in a straight style with a gently tapered waist. Open chest pocket, a yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. The cupro content of the shirt is recycled.

Short coat in a textured weave containing some wool with a zip down the front and a lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Large patch pockets with a flap, and a decorative tab at the cuffs. Lined.
Short-sleeved tops in soft pointelle with a contrasting colour lace trim around the neckline and sleeves.
Short-sleeved tops in soft pointelle with a contrasting colour lace trim around the neckline and sleeves.

Fully lined bikini top with lightly padded cups, a decorative knot detail at the front, side support and a silicone trim at the top. Detachable ties at the back of the neck and a metal fastener at the back.

Baseball jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with appliqués, a small, ribbed stand-up collar, press-studs down the front and jetted front pockets. Contrasting colour sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved blouse in a crinkled, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and a flounce at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved blouse in a crinkled, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and a flounce at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.

Short, V-neck dress in stretch jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, decorative crossover straps at the back and tie straps at the top. Gathered seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and high cut at the back.
Underwired lace bra with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Underwired lace bra with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.

Mesh body with underwired, lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide good support. Adjustable, double shoulder straps, a horizontal strap at the back and a lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Short skirt in patterned, textured fabric with a sewn-in wrapover with pleats at the front and a concealed zip and button at the back. Unlined.
Shopper in grained imitation leather with a scalloped edge at the top and two handles. Unlined. Size 14x28x38 cm.
High-waisted shorts in woven fabric with side pockets and fake welt pockets at the back. Wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and slits in the sides.
High-waisted shorts in woven fabric with side pockets and fake welt pockets at the back. Wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and slits in the sides.

V-neck blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with a frill-trimmed neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length sleeves with small lace trims and trumpet cuffs, and a wide lace trim at the hem. Unlined.
Longer jacket in a patterned weave containing some linen with notch lapels, flap welt front pockets and no buttons. Lined.
Plastic Alice bands with cat ears.
Fisherman's hat in cotton twill with an embroidered motif. Width of brim 7 cm.
Fisherman's hat in cotton twill with an embroidered motif. Width of brim 7 cm.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with full feet and wide foldover ribbing at the waist.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with full feet and wide foldover ribbing at the waist.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with full feet and wide foldover ribbing at the waist.

Dungaree shorts in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with elastication at the back and adjustable straps with a button. Kangaroo pocket with a print motif and sewn-on ears, concealed press-studs at the crotch, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Set with a top and dungarees in soft organic cotton. Jersey top with short sleeves and press-studs on one shoulder. Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with adjustable straps and elastication at the back of the waist. Kangaroo pocket with appliqués, concealed press-studs at the crotch, and short legs with sewn-in turn-ups.

All-in-one suit knitted in marled fleece with contrasting colour trims, a jersey-lined hood and two zips down the front. Foldover ends at the cuffs and hems to keep the hands and feet warm. Fleece inside.
Ankle-length jersey trousers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Wide, ankle-length trousers in a patterned weave with elastication at the back of the waist, side pockets and wide, gently flared legs.
Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, embroidery on the front and a low-cut back.
Pyjamas with a long-sleeved top and bottoms in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Top with ribbing around the neckline. Bottoms with an elasticated, ribbed waist.

Long dress in a patterned viscose weave with a slight sheen. Sewn-in wrapover at the top, concealed zip in one side and short sleeves with a flounced trim. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, and a wide skirt with decorative flounces. Unlined.
High-waisted jersey trousers with contrasting colour side stripes, an elasticated waist and wide, ankle-length legs with sewn-in creases .

Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud and tie at the top. Long sleeves with slits and a drawstring at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and an asymmetric hem. Longer at the back.

ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Jumpsuit in a patterned viscose weave with a collar, concealed buttons at the top and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Gathered yoke at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist with a tie, side pockets and wide, straight legs. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and v-cut at the front.

Fully lined bandeau bikini top with padded cups and removable inserts. Detachable ties at the back of the neck, ties at the back, side support and a silicone trim at the top.

Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with hard-worn details in a relaxed fit. Elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Mesh trainers with glittery sections and imitation leather details, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Mesh trainers with glittery sections and imitation leather details, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long parka in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, lined hood with an elasticated edge, small stand-up collar and zip down the front. Drawstring at the waist and elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Long parka in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, lined hood with an elasticated edge, small stand-up collar and zip down the front. Drawstring at the waist and elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Shorts in a soft cotton weave with elastication at the back of the waist and frills.
Scratch mittens in soft organic cotton jersey with ribbed cuffs. No thumbs.
Rib-knit jumper in soft cashmere with a stand-up collar, long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a straight hem.
Rib-knit jumper in soft cashmere with a stand-up collar, long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a straight hem.

Jumper in soft, rib-knit cashmere with a hole pattern, small stand-up collar and long sleeves.

Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with adjustable straps that button at the front and ribbed side sections. Kangaroo pocket with appliqués and a print motif, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and ribbed hems.
ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Oversized T-shirt in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with dropped shoulders and embroidery with beads and sequins at the top.
